text: The Regattas of San Francisco is a 1960 French film directed by Claude Autant- Lara. It was also known as . There was a dispute between the producer, Raoul Levy, and the director, Claude Autant-Lara when the former insisted on making cuts to the movie. This resulted in the latter trying to take his name off the film. ==References== ==External links== * Category:French films Category:1960 films Category:Films directed by Claude Autant-Lara
title: The Regattas of San Francisco
